multiplechoiceresponse.p: Which of the following agents would benefit from unanticipated inflation?

choicegroup.choice: The soldiers of Westeros, who are paid wages based on the salary negotiated last year
Grey Worm, who has $3,000 in student loan debt that has a fixed interest rate of 3.5%
Olenna, who has stashed away money in a cave
Ygritte, who loaned Robb money last year at 3%
Bran, whose nominal income is the same every month
